ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Dracona knelt down by Plintissa and started to fix a rather large hole. OOOHHHHH LOOOOOK! Why, it s the smart one! I don t know about your opinion, but mine

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Dracona knelt down by Plintissa and started to fix a rather large hole.

"OOOHHHHH LOOOOOK! Why, it's the smart one! I don't know about your opinion,
but mine is that your an idiot!" Stranato said suddenly in a voice more
repulsive than his last.

"Your opinion doesn't count." Dracona replied. Stranato growled.

"Of course my Opinion counts! I am the leader of the Radicons!" Stranato
scremed.

"What Radicons?" Dracona said back. Stranato growled and went back to work,
causing much damage to the Ark instead of fixing it. Dracona whispered
something into Plintissa's ear and they went back to work. Airbomber and
Train Wreck walked out and started to fix the Ark, Airbomber was just moving
at at slight speed, despite his ability to move faster. Train Wreck went
slowly so his intelligence would work fast. Suddenly, the smell of beer and
cigar smoke filled the air. Scamrock and Stronghold enter the scene.

"You are not welcome here! Please remove yourself before I take action!"
Stranato instantly said without looking.

"We chave a right to be at the Maximals base, it's not yours!" Stronghold
said, punching his hand repeatedly. Scamrock looked around for any enemies
that might suddenlyy attack without reason, but seen none. Scamrock and
Stronghold start to help with the base. Dracona was moving the quickest, and
was getting good work done. She was even fixing what Stranato screwed up.
Plintissa thought about her day dream, it was scary, who was Deemos?

"You know, you guys all got cooler names than me, because you don't use your
real names, I've been thinking that I should do that, too!" Scamrock said.
Stronghold nodded and patched up a hole. Scamrock laughed. Stranato mocked
his laugh and punched a hole in the Ark. Dracona puched him away. Stranato
moved to the upper part of the Ark to repair that in his own special way.
Dracona followed him, just to be sure he didn't screw up. Stranato shot at
Plintissa! Plintissa dodged. Dracona shoved Stranato off of the wall and he
fell with a thud.

"What was that for!?" Stranato yelled. Plintissa went back to work.

At the Pred base, Lightmare was repaired and went along her business, hoping
somebody would come along, be her friend and stuff, she was pretty lonely...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 25, 2000 2:12 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


* Iron Raptor's optics widened in surprise as she felt Prowl put his arm
around her waist and press her to him, though the surprise passed quickly
and a smile developed on her face. She gave him a look that said, " And what
do you think YOU'RE doing?!" but then shook her head with a quiet laugh and
then looked at Plintissa as she came up beside her.
Iron Raptor looked at Plintissa and Dracona, then noting that it seemed that
Dracona was very good with gadgets. She would be a fair help in the
repair.of course so would be Plintissa. She gestured towards the west point
of the Ark with her free hand, the other wrapping around Prowl's own waist.
*

" The west quadrant of the ship is fairly damaged, we need all the help that
we can get to repair it."

* She then looked towards Prowl and then turned her head to look at the two
fembots. *

" That's where WE come in. I need you two to begin reconstruction on the
main console, and just as a warning: Don't mess with the programming
otherwise you'll both have to deal with Iris. OK?"

* She didn't mean to sound mean if she did but she had to put caution before
total trust. With that said she then looked back towards Prowl but then saw
something in his expression that looked a little like concern, but not for
her.something else. Her own expression was puzzled. Her question of why he
was concerned was answered when she heard the charges as well, his own words
also verifying that. Iron Raptor marveled in how well Prowl could kiss as
their lips met but then reluctantly let go of him as he did her and moved
off towards the Ark's exit, being apart from him never did feel very natural
to her.
All of a sudden her com-link came alive with Striker's voice, suddenly
puzzled about what he could possibly mean. Then she suddenly remembered the
transmission she had gotten just as Prowl had come up and held her, then
forgetting it and concentration on the feel of his arm around her.  Her
cheeks blushed a little purple (red and blue make purple, red being the
blush and blue being her skin/armor), taking her mind off the important
things really wasn't a smart thing to do.though it was her who had taken her
mind off of it.
The transmission had been serious and she then looked at Plintissa and
Dracona. *

" You two go and help repair the base, I have something to deal with."

* With that she walked off towards the bridge and sees Striker as she enters
into the room, a determined but concerned look on her face as she approached
a console and activated it. With a fizz the screen came to life, giving a
small profile on the bot Octociz but not enough info to go on. She growled
and then switched the screen to a more detailed surrounding of the Ark to
assess the damage while she thought about the transmission from Bronco. *

" Good, the enemy's retreating.but the base is still damaged extensively."

* She looked up at Striker, she almost had no clue as to what to do. There
was a bot out there with the need to kill another if they didn't meet its'
needs, it was something that she wasn't trained for but it was too late for
that. There was a problem at hand and she had to deal with it, just another
part of being left in charge.
Iron Raptor then deactivated the scan and then looked up at Striker, he was
a commander for a lot longer then she has been.what would he do?
But then it came to her; it was up to HER to decide what they were gunna do.
She then looked around at the bridge but then eased herself down into a near
by chair and leaned back, crossing her legs and closing her optics in
thought. She had to either give Bronco what he wanted or figure out a way to
get Octociz away from him. The bot's termination was not acceptable! Many
ideas ran through her mind, giving Bronco faulty equipment and make him
think that it was functional, while then stealing away with Octociz. Maybe
working out some other deal for something that wasn't needed as much, the
parts in which he asked for were needed to repair the ship. A tracking comp
was all right, that couldn't be so bad.but not one of their best. But he
would have to give them Octociz before he ever got the tracker or what ever
else he had asked for. As long as they got him first they would give him the
equipment.they were not liars and cheats.and she for one kept her word.
With a growl she opened her com-link to Bronco, the opening her optics but
kept leaning back against the chair. *

" Bronco! This is Iron Raptor, Maximal third-in-command and acting
commander. I've received your transmission and I'll meet you on the cliff. I
will be unarmed, I suggest you will be without weapons as well. See you in 5
mega-cycles."

* With that she then deactivated her communicator and then looked over at
Striker, with a simple and calm expression she waved towards him. *

" Care to join me? I might need back up if things go.wrong."
